section.p: There is a sudden ominous grating sound, as the keel of your ship scrapes against some rocks. Then you are thrown violently forward as the ship comes to a dead stop.
‘We’ve run aground, cap’n,’ says the mate, ‘We’ll have to wait for high tide to float us off.’
The ship has caught itself on a sandbar.

choices.choice: Wait for high tide and sail on
